TextView.android:text: E-Learning Quizlet Application offers programming topics, computer related subjects topics and provide different types of quizzes to test what they have learned or to test their knowledge about a certain topic. It is a learning tool for those BSCS students to review their programming topics and to grow their skills.
It is also for students who wants to learn about programming. This application makes the student to learn easier by virtual and online interactive learning resources.
